body: (previous: #28770) - [Release guidelines](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/blob/master/MAINTAIN.md#release-policy) - [Dependencies](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/blob/master/MAINTAIN.md#third-party-dependencies) # Blocking issues - deprecate `--server` in favor of `--connect` - finalize`vim.pos`, `vim.range` - https://github.com/neovim/neovim/pull/36397 - https://github.com/neovim/neovim/pull/33771 - ? https://github.com/neovim/neovim/pull/33578 - https://github.com/neovim/neovim/issues/31903 - #35149 - #27949 # Pre-release (early) - [x] ~~run `scripts/download-unicode-files.sh`~~ (utf8proc 4tw) - [x] Bump deps in [cmake.deps/deps.txt](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/blob/master/cmake.deps/deps.txt) - [x] run `scripts/bump_deps.lua` (luajit, luv, libuv, treesitter) - [ ] treesitter parsers (C, Markdown, Lua, Query, Vim, Vimdoc) - [ ] update queries from nvim-treesitter - [x] lpeg, libiconv, gettext ([neovim/deps/opt](https://github.com/neovim/deps/tree/master/opt)) - [x] libvterm - [x] mpack - [x] ~~[wintools](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/blob/9319d97679053a219b1701d70abce414d0f6a8b0/cmake.deps/deps.txt#L28-L36)~~ - [ ] check s930x CI logs for errors pertaining to big-endian systems # Pre-release - [ ] Remove deprecated functions marked for removal (`vim.deprecate(…, '0.12')`) - [ ] Clean up `news.txt` (sorting, [phrasing](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qs8Gohi1e04)) - [ ] Merge `nvim.appdata.xml` changes from the maintenance branch - [ ] Run `scripts/release.sh` # Post-release - [ ] Push `v0.12.0` tag to https://github.com/neovim/neovim-releases/tags and run the release workflow - [ ] For major releases, create a new `release-x.y` branch. - **Bump the version in CMakeLists.txt** and set `NVIM_VERSION_PRERELEASE`. - [ ] Move `news.txt` to `news-x.y.txt` (and remove/update tags!). Recreate `news.txt` with "skeleton" from the old one. - [ ] Review [revisit-at-release issues](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/labels/revisit-at-release) - [ ] Newsletter https://github.com/neovim/neovim.github.io - [ ] Update [GitHub Sponsors page](https://github.com/sponsors/neovim) (what was done, what is planned) - [ ] Update [roadmap](https://neovim.io/roadmap/) - [ ] Remove deprecated: - N/A # Merge these after release - [revisit-at-release PRs](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/labels/revisit-at-release)

labels.description: Neovim project matters (release process, logo, etc.)
labels.name: project-management

title: release checklist 0.12

type.description: A request, idea, or new functionality
type.name: Enhancement
